metadata.dc:title: Mortalidad hospitalaria en pacientes VIH (1999-2004). Estamos preparados frente a la coinfección por virus hepatotropos?
[Hospital mortality in patients with HIV infection (1999-2004). Are we ready for coinfections by hepatotropic viruses?].
